ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of MARKETA EVANS of Toronto, Ontario, as special adviser to the Minister of International Trade, to be known as the Extractive Sector Corporate Social Responsibility Counsellor, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of two years, effective October 19, 2012.
